name: Funding Circle Holding Plc
goal: Funding Circle (LSE: FCH) is a global SME loans platform, connecting SMEs who want to borrow with investors who want to lend in the UK, US, Germany and the Netherlands. Since launching in 2010, investors across Funding Circle's geographies - including more than 88,000 retail investors, banks, asset management companies, insurance companies, government-backed entities and funds - have lent more than â‚¬7.5 billion to over 62,000 businesses globally. Funding Circle is a member of the FTSE 250 Index.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union Package (in particular the  initiative on Financial Technology (FinTech) and proposals for an EU framework on crowd and peer to peer finance); Digital Single Market Initiatives; Prospectus Directive; European Crowdfunding Service Providers Regulation
